text: The Hang Kasturi Mausoleum () is the mausoleum of Hang Kasturi located in Jonker Walk, Melaka City, Melaka, Malaysia.http://www.utusan.com.my/gaya- hidup/pelancongan/jelajah-ibu-negeri-1.35969 ==Architecture== The mausoleum architecture is much influenced by the art and architecture from India. ==See also== * List of tourist attractions in Melaka ==References== Category:Mausoleums in Malacca
title: Hang Kasturi Mausoleum
